= Control Center =

Messages triggered by the ControlCenter :

|| Protocol || Params || Class ||
|| `Bus Start id=(.*)` || int || BusStartMsg ||
|| `Bus id=(.*) Pos=(.*),(.*)` || int,int,int || BusPositionMsg ||
|| `Station Start id=(.*)` || int || StationStartMsg ||
|| `cc Bus start`|| || StationStartMsg ||
